name: Kevin McSwain
text: This is a great store to stop in if you like Best Buy but only need something for your mobile device. Allison was awesome, she checked our upgrade status and then got us on a new phone in no time. We only came in to exchange a product and her customer service skills and personality made us take the leap. She even worked hard to ensure we received all discounts. Great place, I will definitely come back for my next upgrade.

name: Larry Owens
text: Purchased the Samsung Galaxy S3. Probably one of the best experiences I've ever had in a retail establishment. The sales girl stefany was engaging attentive knowledgeable and very helpful. I would recommended this place to anyone no matter who your cell carrier may be.

name: Rayuna
text: Great place to buy elections, movies, and accessories for electronics.

name: Wes Allday
text: Awful management - and that's being nice. I've bought appliances and electronics here simply because sales prices were unbeatable, but I've had to do everything but beg them to take my money because getting someone to help is impossible. The manager here mopes around or simply hides when you need help. I've never met a retail manager that was so indifferent and outright rude to customers.

name: Glass Orthodontics
text: I have a great fridge I bought back in September 2012. I also purchased an extended warranty. Our fridge went out on Sunday and I have been told that no one can come out to repair until November 4. That will leave us without a fridge for 1.5 weeks. This is ridiculous! I have also been told that we cannot have anyone else work on it under warranty. Needless to say, I am not happy about this at all and will never buy another appliance from here again. We pay for a warranty that is doing us no good. We have already have to throw away so much food!!

name: Chris Jennings
text: Awesome, Best selection on Appliances and Tvs.....Knowledgeable Sales team and Great experience over all.

name: Margaret Hall
text:
My son went in around 7 pm on Friday evening, May 22, 2015, to make a payment on his account.  There were at least 10 associates in the store, and he was passed off to another associate...Bottom line, he was in there 20 minutes, at the main desk, cash in hand, and ...Zip...Nada... No Service, no payment made, typical of this store!   He has gone in several times intending to purchase items, and got no service.
This store is a joke!!
Do yourself a favor and go on down the road to a company that desires your business.

name: Kendra Broughton
text: I am enjoying my tablet and awesome cs all the time!!!

name: Susan Craft
text: Horrible service!! Went there to purchase all new kitchen appliances, new living room set, and mattress set for our newly built home and got no service at all!!! Guess we'll have to spend our 10,000 dollars somewhere else!!! You snooze, you lose!!!

name: Mark Engleman
text: This store is just as crappy as the Pensacola location. No service, horrible management.

name: william littlejohn
text: Called location to get information on product. The person in the electronics department had no knowledge of products. He could not answer any of my questions. In his ghetto voice he then told me I didn't know what I was talking about and hung up on me. We will not be back.

name: Carlos Nelson
text: worst delivery service every got and email that it would be between 5pm and 8pm got a call at 7am of the day it was to be delivered that they would call 40min before delivery well at 7:15pm no call called them we are in Pensacola but we will call u when we are on the way yea BS got a call at 9:15 saying the truck is shut down for the day and they will try and get it to me tomorrow but they don't know what time what the F yea they suck A.

name: Russell Brewer
text: Horrible company that does not stand by it't appliances.

name: demetrious gales
text: Bad experience.

name: Jonathan Kimbrough
text: Ok

name: Georgia Dominick
text:
One star -- only because there's nothing less.

Called on June 20:  held for FORTY-TWO MINUTES (on my office phone).  In the meantime, I called the same number on my cell phone -- and held for TWENTY-THREE MINUTES.  No one ever picked up on my office line -- it finally just disconnected.  Someone finally answered on my cell line.  Was transferred to 3-4 people, only to find that the refrigerator that was supposed to have been delivered 2-3 weeks earlier had never been ordered!  What a great way of doing business.

name: Sherri Hudson
text: The girl put my screen protector on incorrectly. There was a bubble in the middle and she DID NOT have the decency to wash her hands before applying it. Her greasy prints ruined it. I gave her 25 mins to do it. Unacceptable. They did not want to replace it. Or refund me. Corporate will definitely hear from me. 😊

name: Jillian Bringas
text: Very unfortunate to see how the customers are treated after a purchase. My family bought a brand new washer and dryer with extended warranty and when it broke nobody wanted to help. When she called about the original problem they said it was normal to sound that way and ended detroying it. To watch them struggle with two family members with cancer and she has her own health issues and has to run to the laundry mat daily makes my heart sad. I wouldn't even leave a star if I could comment without. Very sad

name: Cassie Bland
text: Absolute WORST cell phone shopping experience of my life!!!! Spent the last two nights in this store attempting to upgrade my phone. I could have gotten better customer service in the cafeteria line at the jail!!!! Waited for over 30 minutes for someone to even speak to us. Many employees came up to ogle at how sweet our baby was but none offered assistance. One employee (who was wandering aimlessly through the store) even asked how we were doing tonight and we told him that we were waiting for some assistance and he said "oh okay" and walked away. HOW RUDE!!! We left after sitting there for another hour while the guy tried to figure out how to do his job. Wow.

name: wishi wasaswede
text: It's best buy. They MIGHT have what you want. But they probably won't know it if they do.

name: Lorie Hughes
text: I can not believe I have been on the phone for 20 min waiting for someone to help me. I hung up and called back... Same thing... No body ever picked up I waited 10 min. this time a total of 30 min. Forget it... I will do business elsewhere.

name: Denise Yates
text: Super quick service. Moderate pricing

name: Karizma 1708
text: Buyers Beware. MANAGER UNRULY AND REFUSES TO HONOR WARRANTY REPLACEMENTS.

name: Traveling Maedkes
text: Waiting for staff to assist can be a looong time.

name: Stevo 251
text: Had a online order, had a pick up email. Girl could not find my order. Turned the register off and on. With terrible attitude, Then Went to the back and got item off shelf . "I've could of done that myself" it was like what was the purpose of ordering online !

name: dheeraj kl
text: Never answer to phone calls

name: Noway Nodice
text: No longer exists.

name: Christen Payne
text: Great price and service! We have been grateful to have our AAA security system to feel protected! Their customer service and call center staff are so supportive and helpful. Would definitely recommend!

resp.text: I really appreciate the feedback. Please call me if you need anything at all. Thanks and God bless

name: Vickey Ellison
text: Services my son's business. He is pleased with the service.

resp.text: Thank you for the review. I'm glad we could help ☺

name: Cynthia Forsman
text: Chris listened to what I needed and he delivered spot on! AAA Security will be who I call for any and all security needs. I would highly recommend them. Wish I could find painters this attentive!

resp.text: I appreciate the feedback. Please let me know if you need anything else. It was a pleasure working with you. God bless!

name: Trey Short
text: I love working with these guys. They are quick, efficient, and the systems that they put in a top-notch and high-quality. When all is said and done I will have four separate property secured by these guys.

resp.text: Again I appreciate the business. If you need anything at all let us know. Enjoyed working with you

name: Jeremy Acray
text: AAA has done several jobs for me over the last 15 years, both surveillance systems and security. They are currently helping me upgrade my home to become a more interactive “smart home.” They have always been very honest and dependable and stand  by their work. Highly recommended.

resp.text: Thanks again for the business. Let us know if you need anything else. Always here to help

Over the years, the service with AAA Security has been awesome!.... As a matter of fact, I think they should rename their company -  A+A+A+ Security..... Any time I have ever had any kind of problem, technical or otherwise, they were Promptly there to resolve the issue... I highly recommend this company for all security Needs.
Ray G.  Boaz, AL

name: jdblackbelt
text:
I've twice now had the pleasure of working with Jonathan at the Best Buy mobile store in the Parkway Place Mall. Both for the initial phone purchase and for the Note 7 recall he was knowledge, friendly, and great to talk to.

On the latter occasion they were busy as quite a few customers were in to replace their Note 7's. Though his shift was over and he was in street clothes ready to leave, he stayed behind to help his co-workers and customers an hour past his scheduled time. Clearly customer satisfaction and aiding his peers is more important to him than leaving on the dot when his shift is up.

Best Buy, if you're reading this, give this man a raise and do whatever you need to keep him around. He's not someone I knew before this purchase, but if he worked for me I'd make sure it stayed that way.

name: Shannon Jeffreys
text:
First,

You can't go to this store for anything but Mobile devices, if a review states otherwise (like laptop memory), they are talking about the wrong Best Buy. This one is in the mall, they are talking about the University location. As far as the University location, I can say plenty bad but will skip it since I worked there at one point.

Now as far as this mobile location:

I bought a prepaid sim card for an unlocked Android device about 15 minutes before closing, on a Friday night. True to their marketing, they made sure it was activated and I had a working phone before I left. There was an issue with the activation (not their fault) and stayed an hour over closing till it was fixed. That's customer service and something you never see. Trust me, you want to leave quickly on a Friday, they stayed. That's the soul reason why I'm writing this review.

One negative, they messed up on the data settings but that was no issue as I resolved that quickly when I got home.

name: Brad G
text: Very helpful staff. Bought a Nexus S and they pricematched the drop that occurred two days later.

name: Jim Jones
text: Terrible customer service WILL NOT GO BACK  I was Sold JUNK !!!!!

name: Henry Tillman Jr
text: Will go back
